price: 114. isin Addunyal tu-masuginniton dago wakti akke waytek, addunyal sugteenih gide Yallih taaqatal asbirinnitoonuy jannatal affoofak tenen, diggah isin woh yaaxige marah suginnitoonuy keenik iyye Yalli.
arabic: قَٰلَ إِن لَّبِثۡتُمۡ إِلَّا قَلِيلٗاۖ لَّوۡ أَنَّكُمۡ كُنتُمۡ تَعۡلَمُونَ

version.title: Afar translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Afar by a group of scholars. under supervision of Shaikh Mahmud Abdulkader Hamza. 1441 H.

meta.transliteration: qāla in labith'tum illā qalīlan law annakum kuntum taʿlamūna
